name: relay-basic
title: Relay Basic
oneLiner: A basic card for relay content

apiDoc.name: RelayCard
apiDoc.description: A comprehensive relay card displaying detailed relay information with NIP-11 data, connection statistics, and management actions. Features expandable sections, relay status indicators, read/write/both mode badges, and action buttons for fetching info, removing, blacklisting, and copying URL. Includes automatic relay info fetching on mount.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (uses context if not provided)

props.name: relay
props.description: Relay object with stats, NIP-11 info, and connection data

props.name: onFetchInfo
props.description: Callback when fetching relay NIP-11 info
